document.docAuthor: Bakker, Piet A. J. & Albano, Paolo G.
document.masterDocTitle: Nomenclator, geographic and stratigraphic distribution of the family Triphoridae (Mollusca: Gastropoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Nomenclator, geographic and stratigraphic distribution of the family Triphoridae (Mollusca: Gastropoda)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Triforis melantera Hervier, 1898
—
Héros et al. 2007: 220
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
MCZ 186159 , lectotype
.
MCZ 186160 , paratype
.

Remarks. Lectotype designated by Clench & Turner (1950) . Lea (1843) recorded this species from the Unites States, Virginia as
Cerithium moniliferum
.
Triforis grimaldii Dautzenberg & H. Fischer, 1906
is widely accepted as a junior synonym of
Cerithium melanura
(e.g. Bouchet 1985 ; Fernandes & Pimenta, 2020 ). Rolán & Fernández- Garcés (2007) and Fernandes & Pimenta (2020) considered
Cerithium dealbatum C.B. Adams, 1850 a
synonym of
Cerithium melanura C.B. Adams, 1850
. Dall (1892) considered
Cerithium submoniliferum d’Orbigny, 1852 a
synonym of
Cerithium melanura C.B. Adams, 1850
.
